thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 4 of 693
thread.title: nick emerton
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by nick emerton

author: nick emerton
title: nick emerton
text: Well I dont know about David always getting exactly what he wants ( Jetstar magazine add ) but I certainly didnt. I got a high mileage car, asked to change but told I couldnt. Car was mechanically faulty with a slipping cvt and I was asked if I wanted to pay extra for roadside assist. Never in my quite broad experience of renting have I come across this before. Back to the big boys for me I think. Nick
